item.title: Blog creation with Jekyll part 1
item.description:
Used commands to install Ruby, Rubygem, rvm and Jekyll:

yum install ruby
yum install gem

Now that Jekyll is installed and functionnal on a no-root user, you can create a blog skeleton with this command:

jekyll new myBlog

A new directory myBlog is created by Jekyll with basic template blog files:

_layouts/default.html
_layouts/post.html
_layouts/page.html
_sass/_base.scss
_sass/_syntax-highlighting.scss
_sass/_layout.scss
_includes/head.html
_includes/header.html
_includes/footer.html
